name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - W | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
To solve a telescope word, three clues are given.  For instance, a clue might read "beverage - ice skating arena - pen fluid".  A telescope word is one word that, when you drop the first letter, makes a new word.  Therefore, drop the first letter from a word meaning "beverage" to get an "ice skating arena", and do that again to get a word meaning "pen fluid".  The answer, then, is "drink - rink - ink".  However, only put in the longest word, in this case, "drink", to answer the questions.  Make sense?  Here we go!

Remember, all answers start with W.

Clean - Cinders - Quiet!
Growing bigger, as in the moon - Chopping or "giving the boot" - Chinese name or band acronym (Crossing in New Genre)
Cloth patterns - Lower edge of a roof - Class of birds
Either - Complex, mysterious, beautiful woman - Anesthetic

This clue is special, since it has 5 clues!

Cowboys and Indians movie genre - Water dragon - Strict - Type of bird - Another type of bird
questions.explanation:
Western.

	Western - Estern - Stern - Tern - Ern (also, Erne)

questions.text: Tire/Tyre - Part of foot - Long fish
